AcInput.description: This is the definition for AC Input.
AcInput.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for AC Input for a Redfish implementation.

AcOutput.description: This is the definition for AC Output.
AcOutput.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for AC Output for a Redfish implementation.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AssetTag.description: The actual Asset Tag of VFD.
AssetTag.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Asset Tag of VFD.

CommandSpeed.description: The actual Command Speed of VFD.
CommandSpeed.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Command Speed of VFD.

CommunicationsError.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Communications Error boolean value of VFD.

DateOfManufacture.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual date of manufacture of VFD.

DcBus.description: This is the definition for DC Bus.
DcBus.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for DC Bus for a Redfish implementation.

DcUnderOverVolts.description: The actual DC Under/Over Volts value of VFD.
DcUnderOverVolts.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual DC Under/Over Volts value of this VFD.

DriveAtSpeed.description: The actual Drive At Speed value of VFD.
DriveAtSpeed.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Drive At Speed value of VFD.

DriveControl.description: The actual Drive Control of VFD.
DriveControl.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Drive Control of VFD.

DriveFail.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Drive Fail of VFD.

DriveOverTemperature.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Drive Over Temperature value of VFD.

DriveStatus.description: The actual Drive Status of VFD.
DriveStatus.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Drive Status of VFD.

FirmwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Firmware Revision of VFD.

FirstFault.description: The actual First Fault of VFD.
FirstFault.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual First Fault of VFD.

FlyingStart.description: The actual Flying Start status of VFD.
FlyingStart.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Flying Start boolean value of VFD.

HardwareRevision.description: The actual Hardware Revision of VFD.
HardwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Hardware Revision of VFD.

KWHours.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Kilowatt-Hours of this VFD.

LastFault.description: The actual Last Fault of VFD.
LastFault.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Last Fault of VFD.

Manufacturer.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Manufacturer of VFD.

Model.description: The actual Model Number of VFD.
Model.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Model Number of VFD.

MotorOverTemperature.description: The actual Motor Over Temperature value of VFD.
MotorOverTemperature.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Motor Over Temperature value of VFD.

Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PartNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Part Number of VFD.

PhysicalLocation.description: The actual Physical Location of VFD.
PhysicalLocation.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Physical Location of VFD.

ReverseDirection.description: The actual Reverse Direction status of VFD.
ReverseDirection.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Reverse Direction boolean value of VFD.

RunTime.description: The actual Run Time of VFD.
RunTime.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Run Time of VFD.

SecondFault.description: The actual Second Fault of VFD.
SecondFault.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Second Fault of VFD.

Sensors.description: Contains the members of this sensor collection.

SerialNumber.description: The actual Serial Number of VFD.
SerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Serial Number of VFD.

Speed.description: The actual Speed value of VFD.
Speed.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Speed value of VFD.

Started.description: The actual Started status of VFD.
Started.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Started boolean value of VFD.
